events.message: I received my new headphones today, but they have a noticeable scratch on the left ear cup and the sound quality seems off.
The reported issue involves a visible scratch and possible defect affecting sound quality in the headphones.
Assigning the case to the product support specialist for further investigation and assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your headphones. Let's work together to get this sorted out.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and let us know if you have tried using the headphones with another device?
I attached pictures showing the scratch, and yes, I tried them on two different phones but the sound issue persists.
We can offer you a replacement pair of headphones or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
Thank you, I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible, please.
Your replacement order has been processed and will ship within 2 business days. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement headphones arrived in good condition and are working properly.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything works perfectly now. Thanks for the quick resolution!
We are glad to hear that your issue is resolved. We are closing this case now. Have a great day!
